Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm hit a walk-off single in the 10th inning to score Anthony Volpe and win the game 4-3
Juan Soto hit a two-run homer in the sixth inning to break his cold streak
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz Chisholm expressed excitement about the playoff atmosphere in the Bronx
The Yankees extended their lead in the American League East to 1.5 games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luis Gil delivered a strong performance, allowing just one earned run over five innings
Austin Wells hit a sacrifice fly in the bottom of the 10th inning to tie the game at 3-3
